data.text: Yeinom ne mmammarima a wɔwowoo wɔn maa Dawid wɔ Hebron.
Ne ba a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, na wɔfrɛ no Absalom. Na ne maame din de Maaka a na ɔyɛ Gesurhene Talmai babaa.
Ne ba a ɔtɔ so enum no, na wɔfrɛ no Sefatia. Na wɔfrɛ ne maame Abital.
Wɔwowoo mmammarima baasia yi nyinaa maa Dawid wɔ Hebron. Ɔdii adeɛ wɔ hɔ mfirinhyia nson ne fa.
Mmammarima a wɔwowoo wɔn maa Dawid wɔ Yerusalem no ne:
Wɔsane wowoo mmammarima baakron bi maa Dawid. Wɔne Yibhar, Elisua, Elifelet,
Yeinom ne Dawid mmammarima a ne mpena mma nka ho. Na Dawid wɔ ɔbabaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Tamar.
Yehoiakim babarima Yehoiakyin na ɔdii nʼadeɛ,
Yehoiakyin a Babiloniafoɔ kyeree no kɔtoo afiase no
Malkiram, Pedaia, Senasar, Yekamia, Hosama ne Nedabia.
Na ne mmammarima baanum bi nso din ne Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia ne Yusab-Hesed.
